channel.title: Keto on Sparkly Alpaca
channel.description: Recent content in Keto on Sparkly Alpaca

item.title: Why keto diets are garbage
item.author: lucystreams+beautyblog@gmail.com (Lucy Rebekah)
item.description: Recently, I have done some experimenting with keto baking. To say that I am bitterly disappointed is an understatement. I’ve also done some Coursera courses on nutrition and exercise science. This has crystallised my thoughts into the following: “Keto is an overhyped, money-making sham.” Let me defend this opinion. Let’s start with what keto is good for. Obviously, it is good for epileptics, as this is what it was originally designed for.
